root.name: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader?
root.description: OverviewAre You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? is a trivia game show game. The Nintendo DS version was developed by ValuSoft, Inc. while the PC version was developed by THQ, which published both versions.Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? is the first in the series of games that is based on the Jeff Foxworthy hosted TV game show of the same name.PC System RequirementsWindows XP/VistaPentium IV 1.2GHz Processor256MB RAM120MB Hard Disk SpaceDirectX 9.032MB Video CardDirectX Compliant Sound Card
